thread.title: Kristine

author: Kristine
title: Kristine
text: I ordered a plum tree, a Green Gage, to be specific. It arrived in a timely manner, well packaged. The directions were clear, I was a little worried about the bare root system, but they were coated in a gelatin to keep them hydrated. I only gave 4 stars because it's still winter, hopefully if everything goes well I will get flowers, leaves and possibly a few plums this season.
